attributes.action: Increase the amount and quality of free aid and equipment available to gifted and talented children.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The result of this petition will be to increase the amount and quality of free aid and equipment available to gifted and talented children who strive everyday to work to the best of their ability, while the resources and funding that could aid them so well in life are given to a considerably high amount of children who do not try to work to the best of their ability, as high or limited as that may be.
